scripts.api:clean: docker stop feature-api; docker rmi feature/api
scripts.api:all: npm run api:clean; npm run api:build; npm run api:run
scripts.nginx:clean: sudo docker stop feature-nginx; docker rmi feature/nginx
scripts.nginx:build: sudo docker buildx build -f nginx/Dockerfile -t feature/nginx ./nginx
scripts.nginx:run: sudo docker run -d --rm --name feature-nginx --network host feature/nginx
scripts.nginx:all: sudo npm run nginx:clean; npm run nginx:build; npm run nginx:run
